• Collection
  • Road Map
We are a group of 8.000 Aliens randomly generated, coming from the Nasar Planet. You can find us in the IMX platform, in the ETH layer 2, which means NO GAS FEES. We have noticed that humans are having a very tough time trying to evolve without actually destroying themselves and the planet they live in. We were given the instruction of coming to give a hand and help humanity as we could. We took off from Nasar Planet some light years ago, and finally we are arriving on Earth to start our mission. A spaceship of 2.000 Aliens is arriving first. Then, every 10 days a new spaceship with 2.000 more is going to land! Until we are 8.000!

    All Moody Krow owners will now be able to engage in our rewards program that rewards participation and growth within our Discord server.
